summary: An insane hunter arranges for a ship to be wrecked on an island where he can indulge in some sort of hunting and killing of the passengers.
cast: Joel McCrea|Fay Wray|Robert Armstrong|Leslie Banks|Noble Johnson|Steve Clemente|William B. Davidson|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|James Flavin|Arnold Gray|Hale Hamilton|Landers Stevens|Phil Tead
director: Directors: Irving Pichel, Ernest B. Schoedsack
title: El malvado Zaroff
